website_summaries.verdict: A heavier duty Yamaha sea scooter that features an impact-resistant hull.
pros: This unit is designed to operate at speeds up to 3 miles per hour and it features a standard GoPro camera mount (camera not included)
There is an automatic shut-off that engages if the triggers are released and the model is good for depths of up to 100 feet
cons: Occasionally a unit slips through quality control that is not up to standards

customer_reviews.title: battery and power die out quick
customer_reviews.text: started out great, kids loved it! we would use it then take it out of the pool and put it on charge. within 3 months the batteries are acting up and the power is not there anymore. for this money, it should've lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER VARTANOV

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Lasts more like 5-10 minutes max. I bought two of them with a spare battery and same thing with both. 5-10 minutes of run time
customer_reviews.author: Kim Check

customer_reviews.title: Preferred my SeaDoo
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar powered, level SeaDoo for 10 years. Easy to use, easy to recharge, very reliable. Sadly knocked overboard and lost at sea. Bought this Yamaha to replace. Works well and definitely has a longer battery life than the SeaDoo, but on/off switch seems flimsy, and they've over complicated the the disassembly process to get to the battery for recharge. I like it, but wish I'd bought another SeaDoo
customer_reviews.author: GN Douglas

customer_reviews.title: if your want to snorkel
customer_reviews.text: this is not good for diving as it has no power even on the higher levels it barely takes you under the water but its good for lazy snorkeling and very mild diving.

product_meta.title: YAMAHA Seascooter with Camera Mount Recreational Dive Series Underwater Scooter
product_meta.description:
The Yamaha Seascooter is lightweight and powerful

Designed to cruise at speeds up to 3.0mph (4.8km/h) the RDS300 will allow you to maximize your underwater dive experience. Featuring a depth rating of 100ft (30m) and 2 level rotational speed control* the RDS300 is perfect for the recreational diving enthusiast.

 * Run up to 1.5 hours with normal use.
 * Rated to 100ft / 30m.
 * Speed up to 3 mph / 4.8 km/h.
 * 2-level rotational speed control (for US model) *Single Speed Control (for EU model).
 * Waterproof construction prevents accidental flooding.
 * Impact resistant heavy duty rubber hull protection.
 * Superior safety features include: auto shut off when triggers are released, thermal switch function and water leakage sensor.
 * Removable buoyancy control chamber (The RDS300 is designed for use in salt water. It will have less buoyancy in fresh water, and may slowly sink in fresh bodies of water).
 * Powered by a Sealed Lead Acid Battery (Occasional battery maintenance required).
 * Product size: 24” x 15.2” x 12.3” / 612 x 385 x 312 (mm)
 * Weight just 18 lbs / 8.2 kg including battery.
